idea-plugin.name: AI Copilot
idea-plugin.description:
AI-powered code completion assistant for IntelliJ IDEA that provides intelligent code suggestions using OpenAI GPT or Anthropic Claude. Features include:
• Real-time code completion with AI assistance • Context-aware suggestions based on your current code • Support for multiple programming languages • Comment-to-code generation • Configurable AI providers (OpenAI, Claude) • Fast response times with intelligent caching • Environment variable based configuration for security
Simply start typing or add a comment describing what you want to code, and get intelligent suggestions powered by state-of-the-art AI models.
Configuration: Set environment variables: - OPENAI_API_KEY for OpenAI GPT-4 - ANTHROPIC_API_KEY for Anthropic Claude - AI_PROVIDER=OPENAI or AI_PROVIDER=CLAUDE (optional, defaults to OpenAI)
